titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on M-Alcohol.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/28/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 2009, the duty on (2,4-Dichlorophenyl)-3-(1H-1,2,4-triazol-1-yl)-1-propanol (M-Alcohol).
